title: Taka Aono
text:
Taka Aono is a Japanese drift driver currently (as of February 2009) competing in the American <a href="Formula%20D">Formula D</a> series in his <a href="Toyota%20AE86">Toyota Sprinter AE86 Trueno</a>.
Before his professional drifting career began, Taka was a successful autocross driver, and was instrumental in building southern California's drift scene. Taka was previously sponsored by <a href="Falken%20Tires">Falken Tires</a>, however he has since lost his sponsorship deal due to an unsuccessful season in 2008. Taka is also known to have given up a career as a <a href="chiropractor">chiropractor</a> to become a drift driver.
Taka is now sponsored by <a href="Nexen%20Tire">Nexen Tire</a> and Megan Racing.
Other Activities.
Taka Aono participated in Project Car Tuner Magazine's Toyota Corolla Drift Project, contributing time, expertise, and parts.
